channel.title: Homelab series on Personal ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Homelab series on Personal ramblings

item.title: Homelab Series
item.description: Idea behind Homelab series is to describe how to easily setup multiple hyper-v machines for your homelab. People ussualy buy and setup multiple raspberry PI to learn. That is awesome, sometimes cumbersome and also expensive. This solution assumes you already have a strong desktop PC with lot of RAM and free HDD space. If you are lacking in RAM department for around 80 Euros you can get 16 Gigs of RAM.
